text: Hi is there anyone tried API contact list addcontact. got error adding email
Can somebody help me with this
remove your hapikey for security reasons :slightly_smiling_face:

you are exposing publicly you API key, remove it like this:
`<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/createOrUpdate/email/navneet.test203@gmail.com?hapikey=XXXXXXXXX>`
can you provide the object you are sending with the POST?
Email id and first name, last name
